titleStmt.title: Grimellos fortunes, vvith his entertainment in his trauaile A discourse full of pleasure.
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by E. Allde] for E. VVhite, and are to bee solde at his shoppe neere the little norrh [sic] doore of S. Paules-Church at the signe of the Gun,

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: B.N., i.e. Nicholas Breton.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe neere the little norrh [sic] doore of S. Paules-Church at the signe of the Gun
